Uses of Interface
org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse.EventListener

Packages that use EventListener
org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse Support for Server Sent events. 
 

Uses of EventListener in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse
 

Classes in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse that implement EventListener
 class EventSource
          Client for reading and processing incoming Server-Sent Events.
 

Methods in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse with parameters of type EventListener
 void EventSource.register(EventListener listener)
          Register new event listener to receive all streamed SSE events.
 void EventSource.register(EventListener listener, String eventName, String... eventNames)
          Add name-bound event listener which will be called only for incoming SSE events whose name is equal to the specified name(s).
